page.title: 08RELIGION, LYNEMOUTH.
page.content: {The Vicar.} Father Skelton has been a priest for over nine years. He has been to three churches all together. For the past three years he has been in Lynemouth. Every day he does morning and evening prayers in the Church and he also says Holy Communion every day. He conducts weddings, funerals and baptises people.He visits the sick people and the homes of those people who go to Church. In the past three years he has conducted more than fifty weddings in the Parish. Most of his time is spent either in Church conducting prayers or services and in visiting throughout the Parish. Father Skelton is not married. If he wasn't a Priest he says he would like to be a Hotel owner. {Churches. There are two Anglican Churches in
